panels.title: Py's PurpleAIr Station Rocky Point @70m

panels.description:
Experimental VOC (Bosch Static IAQ) BME680

0-50 Excellent
51-100 Good
101-150 Lightly Polluted -- ventilation suggested
151-200 Moderately Polluted
201-250 Heavy Polluted, Exposure may have health effects depending on type of VOC
251... Very bad, run....
351... Dangerously polluted, neurotoxic effects possible

https://www.bosch-sensortec.com/media/boschsensortec/downloads/datasheets/bst-bme680-ds001.pdf
panels.title: PurpleAIr Station Index for Air Quality

targets.query: SELECT (mean("current_temp_f")-32)*5/9-5 FROM "PurpleAirQuality" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(20m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("current_humidity") FROM "PurpleAirQuality" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m) fill(null)

panels.description: By default, this chart will show zero, because you have to set up solar integration in the code manually. See the Wiki section titled "Solar PV Integration"

targets.query: SELECT mean("power") FROM "solar" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
